content: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I can help you schedule an appointment for HVAC work. May I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Jasmine! Could you please provide your address so I can check if you're in our service area?
Thank you! Let me quickly check if we service your area.
I'm sorry, Jasmine. Unfortunately, it looks like your address is outside our current service area. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's fine. I also found someone cheaper online, so I'll go with them instead. Thanks anyway.
reason: customer chose a cheaper competitor and is out of service area
